hero.title: Welcome to Medium-ish
hero.description: A modern platform for writers, developers, and creators to share their knowledge, build their audience, and connect with like-minded individuals.

features.title: What You Can Do
features.subtitle: Discover the powerful features that make Medium-ish the perfect platform for content creators

write.title: Write & Publish
write.description: Create beautiful articles with our rich text editor. Share your knowledge, experiences, and insights with the world.

profile.title: Build Your Profile
profile.description: Showcase your expertise, connect with followers, and build your personal brand in the developer community.

discover.title: Discover Content
discover.description: Explore articles from talented writers, learn new skills, and stay updated with the latest trends in technology.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
